divs: sighting detailsit happened about the time i was walking into my bed room and i noticed a red light through the curtains.i at first though that it was a helicopter but it didn't make any sound . i opened the curtains and watched it as it moved over the field by my house .as it got closer to ground the red lights seemed to get smaller . when it landed it went black . it landed about 1\8 of a mile or so from my house .i wasn't sure what i just saw .so me and my nephew went outside to see if we could see any thing .we noticed a white light moving across the field .it was going off and on .it was shaped like a football but twice as big. when it would go off ,when it came back on it would be in a diffrent place . as a adult i have to say it scared me .so we went back in the house .i didn't watch to see if it left .i have no ideal what it was ,and hope i don't incounter it again .i didn't get much sleep tha night .
Summary: I seen it from the back ,It looked like a triangle from the back it lite up in red .
